title: Citi selected as Best Global Bank for Cash Management by Global Finance Magazine for 2023
summary: Citi also named Best Global Provider of Short-Term Investments/Money Market Funds, as well as earning regional recognition
tag-1: Citi selected as Best Global Bank for Cash Management by Global Finance Magazine for 2023
tag-2: Citi also named Best Global Provider of Short-Term Investments/Money Market Funds, as well as earning regional recognition
tag-3: New York, NY – Citi has been named the Best Global Bank for Cash Management in 2023 by Global Finance Magazine. The publication also named Citi the Best Global Provider of Short-Term Investments/Money Market Funds. In addition, Citi earned recognition with multiple regional awards across Liquidity Management and Payments & Collections.
tag-4: “In a world where global inflation has returned and supply chain issues continue to remain, smart management of cash and treasury systems is more important than ever,” said Joseph D. Giarraputo, publisher and editorial director of Global Finance. “Our awards honor the organizations that best serve their clients in these unpredictable times.”
tag-5: “Citi remains committed to delivering excellence in the services and solutions we provide for clients,” said Shahmir Khaliq, Citi’s Global Head of Treasury and Trade Solutions. “And we are continuing to invest in our platforms and capabilities to enhance the client experience and expand the integrated solutions we offer. This Global Finance award is a recognition of our dedication to innovation and focus on our clients.”
tag-6: “In today’s uncertain economic environment, liquidity management is more important than ever, particularly for organizations doing business globally,” added Stephen Randall, Global Head of Liquidity Management Services, Citi Treasury and Trade Solutions. “Being recognized as Best Bank for Cash Management and Best Provider of Short-Term Investments/Money Market Funds by Global Finance is further validation of our global liquidity management networks and our steadfast commitment to helping clients better manage capital and liquidity risks, on the path to meeting critical objectives around growth, resiliency and efficiency. Our continued commitment to innovation across a wide range of Short-Term Investment solutions allows our clients to better integrate and simplify investment management, enhance workflows and automate data flows, whilst providing greater choice when optimizing liquidity, managing exposures and counterparty risks.”
tag-7: Citi received top honors across global, regional and country categories including:
tag-10: Best Provider of Short-Term Investments/Money Market Funds
tag-13: Best Overall Bank for Cash Management: South Korea
tag-16: Best Overall Bank for Cash Management: Argentina
tag-17: Best Overall Bank for Cash Management: Colombia
tag-18: Best Overall Bank for Cash Management: Mexico
tag-19: Best Overall Bank for Cash Management: Puerto Rico
tag-23: Best Provider of Short-Term Investments/Money Market Funds
tag-24: Best Overall Bank for Cash Management: United States
tag-25: Citi Treasury and Trade Solutions (TTS) helps enable our clients' success by providing an integrated suite of innovative and tailored cash management and trade finance services to multinational corporations, financial institutions and public sector organizations across the globe. Based on the foundation of the industry's largest proprietary network with banking licenses in over 90 countries and globally integrated technology platforms, TTS continues to lead the way in offering a comprehensive range of digitally enabled treasury, trade and liquidity management solutions.
tag-27: Citi is a preeminent banking partner for institutions with cross-border needs, a global leader in wealth management and a valued personal bank in its home market of the United States. Citi does business in nearly 160 countries and jurisdictions, providing corporations, governments, investors, institutions and individuals with a broad range of financial products and services.
